text: The 1998 Air Force Falcons football team represented the United States Air Force Academy in the 1998 NCAA Division I-A football season.https://www.sports-reference.com/cfb/schools/air- force/1998-schedule.html ==Schedule== ==Personnel== ==Awards/Honors== Frank Mindrup *3rd Team All-American (AFF) *2nd Team All-WAC ==References== Air Force Category:Air Force Falcons football seasons Category:Western Athletic Conference football champion seasons Category:1998 in sports in Colorado
